Frequently Asked Questions

If any of your questions are not addressed, feel free to send us a message.

Do Trillium tabletops fit over my existing table?

Yes, they are designed to adhere to any textured surface.

Does this replace my table top??

No, it is a plastic-type material that goes over your existing top.

Do I install it onto the table myself?

Yes, it is very simple. You will need a pencil, a pair of scissors, and a hair dryer. It will take about fifteen minutes.

Are they non-slip?

They have a LOT of texture, very similar to most grooming table tops.

How do they hold up to nails and product?

I have had mine for about a year and it has been filthy with mud, etc. It has had countless Newfy groomings (and daily brushings). It has been hosed down, soaped, and scrubbed with a scrub brush. I have seen almost no wear. A couple very small spots in the black areas, but no big deal.

What quality does my picture need to be?

The photo you choose does not have to be professionally taken to look great. You just have to choose one that makes you think, "I just love this picture of ..." We will enhance the photo to make it look fantastic!

What kind of table do they work on?

Most of them, unless the surface is unusually textured, loose, or fabric.

My table has a hole for a handle. Will these tabletops work with it??

Some tables have handle holes built right into them. This picture shows how the tabletop conforms to the opening. The purple border is also part of our tabletop.

Can you ship out of the country?

Yes.

How much does it cost?

Tables tops smaller than 20x40 are $140 plus shipping. Large table tops from 20x40 to 27x44 are $150 plus shipping. Larger table tops are available by quote.

Does any picture work?

Yes, with the exception of copyright protected photos, unless you have a release. High resolution digital is preferred, but we can even use old film photos if that's what you want on your table.

Can I use something other than a traditional photograph as a tabletop?

You don't have to be limited to traditional photographs on your custom grooming tabletop. If you have a digital file, we can put it on your table. Here, Graceland Corgis has a painted logo that makes a perfect grooming tabletop. We added the pink background and title.

Can you make changes to the photo?

Yes, we are professional photographers with extensive retouching experience. You will be surprised what we can do. Note below, the people in the background were removed, the background was blurred, the dog was sharpened, and "Q" with a shadow was added.

Are there additional charges for retouching the photos?

Basic "touch up" is included. Any retouching beyond basic enhancements will be charged on a case-by-case basis. Adding text and logos are included. Quotes will be made before you make a commitment.
